Programme 2020

15 November, 2019 | Graham Welsby

There are a lot of practical workshops this year. We have added more practical sessions this year so you can put into practice all the theory we have discussed over the last few years programmes. Make sure you bring your camera with you for all the sessions as some may have an opportunity to practice also.

Count Down To Our Next Meeting

30th March 2020


Workshops / Focus Points


27
Jan
Using Window Light
Using the simplest of tools to get amazing results, how to get the best from the window.
24
Feb
Astro Photogrpahy
This is a special subject which may need special equipment. We may have a special guest to give us a few tips and tricks.
30
Mar
Macro / Close Ups
We get up close and personal and discuss Macro and Close up photography, equipment and techniques.
27
Apr
Flowers & Droplets
This is one of the first of the years workshops. Bring along your cameras so we can take loads of photos.
25
May
Focusing
Another workshop this year, where we will be learning about depth of field, useful tips and tricks but more so practice.
29
Jun
Making the ordinary extraordinary
Can you, what to look out for, what techniques to use to make your normal images amazing.
27
Jul
Interior Lighting
How to make sure that your images always have the right colours even when there are different lights inside.
28
Sep
Panning
We have done this before, but it's still worth discussing this again. Bring your camera just in case we are able to put the theory in to practice.
26
Oct
Fire, Flames & Combustibles
We will be looking at all things on fire or bursting. This should be an exiting presentation.
30
Nov
Oil & Water
The last of the years workshops where we will be trying out the techniques that you can take home and try again.

Quarterly Competition.

(Crop to be no larger than A4)

  • April - Macro / Close Ups
  • July - Beaches & Sea Scapes - Postponed
  • October - Feet, Hooves, Claws & Paws


Monthly Competitions.

(Crop to be no larger than 7x5)

  • February - Winter
  • March - Working Hands
  • April - Wild & Free (Animals - not pets or in captivity) - Postponed
  • May - Showers Amended to Showers & Droplets
  • June - WWII - Amended to - Things in the Kitchen
  • July - Wings
  • September - Hats
  • October - Urban
  • November - Motion


Lancaster Memorial.

(Crop to be no larger than A4)

  • November - Candles
